title: Twisted Love
description: Fate brought them together. Wrath tore them apart. Will love be strong enough to keep them together in the end? This book is part of a 3 book series:Twisted Fate (Book One)Twisted Wrath (Book Two) Will be released: October 22nd 2015.Twisted Love (Book Three) Will be released: December 7th 2015.Twisted and Broken (Book four- Moe's book) January 31st 2016. *There will also be a book starring Moe called "Twisted & Broken" coming out Jan 31st 2016! It won't be a series, but it WILL be a full novel. Side Note: Although the first book isn't, the entire series is considered a dark read.You've been warned.***Warning***This series is not suitable for readers under 18. This series contains elements of emotional, sexual, and physical cruelty. Any readers with sensitivity to the above topics should proceed with caution, and at their own risk.
author: Ashley Jade
